info.description: SCPI command set for the 9129B Triple Output Programmable DC Power Supply (compact short form, optional path segments omitted where unambiguous).
notes: Short forms generally follow the examples in the programming manual (e.g. OUTP, CURR, VOLT, INST:COMB).
Optional command path segments like [:STATe] and [:ALL] are omitted from the key name where they do not affect disambiguation.
Where a command has both set and query forms (e.g. VOLT and VOLT?), they are represented with a single key, using 'set' for the non-query form and 'response' to describe the query's return value.

*PSC.help: Power-on status clear. Controls whether enable registers are cleared on power up (1/ON) or preserved (0/OFF).

*SAV.help: Save current instrument setup (voltage, current, limits) to a non-volatile memory location 1–9.

*RCL.help: Recall a previously saved setup from non-volatile memory location 1–9.

*WAI.help: Wait-to-Continue. Causes the instrument to wait until all pending operations are complete before executing further commands.

SYST:ERR.help: System error query. Returns the next error in the queue as 'code,message', or '0,No error' when queue is empty.

SYST:VERS.help: SCPI version query. Returns the current SCPI version as a string 'YYYY.V'.

SYST:REM.help: Enable remote mode. Locks front-panel keys except the Local key.

SYST:LOC.help: Return control to local (front-panel) operation mode.

OUTP.help: Master output control for all channels. Set form turns all outputs ON/OFF. Query form (via STATe?) returns overall output state.

OUTP:STAT.help: Master output control for all channels. Set form turns all outputs ON/OFF. Query form (via STATe?) returns overall output state.

OUTP:SER.help: Series mode for CH1+CH2. Set or query whether outputs 1 and 2 are combined in series.

OUTP:PAR.help: Parallel mode for CH1+CH2. Set or query whether outputs 1 and 2 are combined in parallel.

CHAN:OUTP.help: Per-channel output state. Controls ON/OFF for the currently selected output channel.

OUTP:PROT:CLE.help: Clear output protection (e.g. over-voltage, over-temperature) allowing output to be re-enabled.

CURR.help: Set or read the output current setpoint for the selected channel. Units are A; accepts numeric, MIN, MAX, DEF, etc.

CURR:UP.help: Increase the current setpoint by one configured step, or by the specified increment if provided.

CURR:DOWN.help: Decrease the current setpoint by one configured step, or by the specified decrement if provided.

CURR:STEP.help: Set or query the current step size used by CURR:UP and CURR:DOWN. Units are A/mA/uA.

APP:CURR.help: Apply current setpoints to all three channels simultaneously as I1,I2,I3 (A/mA/uA). Query form returns three comma-separated current setpoints.

APP:OUTP.help: Per-channel output state for all three channels simultaneously. Takes three booleans b1,b2,b3 and returns three booleans on query.

APP:VOLT.help: Apply voltage setpoints to all three channels simultaneously as V1,V2,V3 (V, mV, etc.). Query form returns three comma-separated voltages.

VOLT.help: Set or read the output voltage setpoint for the selected channel. Units are V; accepts numeric, MIN, MAX, DEF, etc.

VOLT:UP.help: Increase the voltage setpoint by one configured step, or by the specified increment if provided.

VOLT:DOWN.help: Decrease the voltage setpoint by one configured step, or by the specified decrement if provided.

VOLT:STEP.help: Set or query the voltage step size used by VOLT:UP and VOLT:DOWN. Units are kV/V/mV/uV.

VOLT:LIM.help: Set or query the voltage limit for the selected channel. Units are kV/V/mV/uV; accepts numeric, MIN, MAX, DEF.

MEAS:CURR.help: Measure output current on a specified or selected channel. Optional channel argument CH1|CH2|CH3|ALL; units are A.

FETC:CURR.help: Fetch previously measured output current. Same semantics as MEAS:CURR.

MEAS:VOLT.help: Measure output voltage on a specified or selected channel. Optional channel argument CH1|CH2|CH3|ALL; units are V.

FETC:VOLT.help: Fetch previously measured output voltage. Same semantics as MEAS:VOLT.

MEAS:POW.help: Measure output power on a specified or selected channel. Optional channel argument CH1|CH2|CH3|ALL; units are W.

FETC:POW.help: Fetch previously measured output power. Same semantics as MEAS:POW.

MEAS:CURR:ALL.help: Measure current of all three channels simultaneously. Returns 'I1,I2,I3' in A. Alias of MEAS:CURR:ALL?.

MEAS:VOLT:ALL.help: Measure voltage of all three channels simultaneously. Returns 'V1,V2,V3' in V. Alias of MEAS:ALL?.

INST:SEL.help: Select active channel by name CH1|CH2|CH3. Query form returns the currently selected channel.

INST:NSEL.help: Select active channel by numeric index 1–3. Query form returns the currently selected channel number.

INST:COMB:SER.help: Series combination mode. Sets CH1+CH2 to series operation. Query of INST:COMB? returns current combination mode.

INST:COMB:PAR.help: Parallel combination mode. Sets CH1+CH2 to parallel operation. Query of INST:COMB? returns current combination mode.

INST:COMB:OFF.help: Disable series/parallel combination mode. Query of INST:COMB? returns current combination mode.
